name: Golddigger Dating Sim
description:
You play as Vella ,a twenty-two year old woman, working for a firm as a temp, she’s intelligent, a brunette, athletic, optimistic. She had to give up her dreams to become a singer because her mom became a single parent before she was born. She has always want to go to Mallorca since she turned 16. She has been to Florida once on spring break and a vacation in the Bahamas doesn’t really appeal to her. She is also a gold digger. (digging get it?), and she is trying to obtain money from one of three old dudes. You will make choices, and take on the consequences of your actions. 

Just use the arrow keys (or wasd) and spacebar. or dpad and b if you are on a controller.

--Credits---

Coding & Backgrounds: Adam Eason

Writing: Brandon Anthony, Walter Miller

Character art: Carol Miller
